c:atomType.name: ValuesOverflow
c:atomType.c:documentation: The types of behavior to apply when the text of value labels does not fit within the bounds of its associated visual element.

c:atom.name: Show
c:atom.c:documentation: Show a value label whether or not it overflows the bounds of its associated visual element.

c:atom.name: Hide
c:atom.c:documentation: Hide a value label when it overflows the bounds of its associated visual element.

c:atom.name: Trim
c:atom.c:documentation:
Hide a value label when the height of its text overflows the bounds of its associated visual element, but otherwise just trim it so that its width fits those bounds.
When only one or two characters of the original text would show after trimming, the text is also not shown.
